Error_message.auth_error_description: An error occurred during authentication associated with API execution
Error_message.client_error_description: An exception occurred during communication with the API.
Error_message.regist_language_error: Failed to register display language setting.
Error_message.set_mfa_failed: Failed to set MFA. Please try setup again.
Error_message.check_error_message_2: If failure occurs repeatedly, please contact support.
Error_message.error_registration_recept_setting_email: Failed to register user attributions. Redirecting to the home page. Please register attributions again in the user information page.
Error_message.error_update_recept_setting_email: Failed to change email preferences. Please click the change button again. If failure occurs repeatedly, please contact support.
Error_message.apply_change_email_error_title: This email address is already  in use
Error_message.apply_change_email_error_body: This email address is already in use by another account. Please use another email address and try again or if you've already submitted a change please wait as it may take a few minutes to apply.
Error_message.session_expired_error_message:
一定時間操作されなかったため、セッションタイムアウトになりました。
再度、ログイン画面 を表示し、ログインしなおしてください。
また、自動的にinsightwatchのログイン画面へ遷移します。
Error_message.password_expired_error_message_1: 招待された際に発行された初期パスワードの有効期限が切れています。
Error_message.password_expired_error_message_2: 再度、組織のオーナーに招待を依頼してください。
